    • Method Detail

      • hasMessage

        public static boolean hasMessage(Messages messages,
                 java.lang.String key)
        Determines (null safe) if the messages instance has a message with a given message key. The message can be an error or an informational message.
        Parameters:
        messages - The messages to check
        key - The message key to check.
        Returns:
        True if the messages instance has the given message; false otherwise. If messages is null false is returned.

      • hasErrorMessage

        public static boolean hasErrorMessage(Messages messages)
        Determines (null safe) if the messages instance has any error messages.
        Parameters:
        messages - The messages to check
        Returns:
        True if the messages instance has any error messages; false otherwise. If messages is null false is returned.
